Metadata.title: Othoutils | Speech-language pathology clinical references
Metadata.description: Catalog of clinical tools validated by speech-language pathologists with editorial governance and validation tracking.

Header.tagline: Clinically vetted resources by speech-language pathologists

Hero.sectionLabel: References designed and validated by speech-language pathologists
Hero.title: A clinical library to consult proven tools and track their validation
Hero.lead: Built for clinics, hospitals, and rehab centers: Othoutils highlights questionnaires, batteries, and follow-up sheets already reviewed by healthcare professionals. Teams can then quietly propose documented adjustments that are reviewed before publication.

cards.verifiedDesc: Each sheet is reviewed by speech-language pathologists and published with the details practitioners need.
cards.peerDesc: A clear review flow: draft, interdisciplinary review, then secure publishing.
cards.readyDesc: Bright, readable, and accessible interface for the clinic, hospital, or on the go.

Referentials.errorSubtitle: Check your connection or reload the page. The request pulls domains from the test catalog.
Referentials.emptySubsections: No tests are linked to this domain yet.
Referentials.emptyState: No test is available yet. Add entries in Supabase to feed the catalog.

Tools.headingText: A quick view of the tests in the database, coming straight from Supabase via Drizzle to stay aligned with the schema.

errors.load: Tests cannot be retrieved right now. Check the Supabase connection or try again later.

Tools.emptyState: No test is available yet. Add entries in Supabase to feed the catalog.

items.workflow: Keep drafts, validated sheets, and community content in clearly separated spaces.
items.committee: Set up a multidisciplinary review board with automatic validation assignments.
items.archives: Archive versions to track changes, comments, and therapeutic decisions.

fallback.description: This tool does not yet have a detailed description.

errors.fetch: The tools could not be retrieved right now. Please try again later.

metadata.title: Othoutils | Clinical catalog
metadata.description: Tests, tools, and speech-language evaluations gathered in a curated catalog.

Catalogue.headingText: Find published evaluations, their clinical objectives, target populations, and practical details to plan your sessions.

errors.load: The catalog cannot be displayed right now. Check the Supabase connection or try again shortly.

Catalogue.emptyState: No test is cataloged yet. Add your first tests to populate the catalog.

metadata.title: Manage resources | Othoutils
metadata.description: Create or update catalog resources and their taxonomy relations.

ResourcesManage.pageLead: Create new resources or edit existing entries, including their domains, tags, and themes.

description.label: Description
description.placeholder: Context or how to use this resource.

identity.title: Resource details
identity.helper: Provide the essential information for this resource.

taxonomy.title: Taxonomy
taxonomy.helper: Attach domains, tags, and themes to help filtering and discovery.

multiSelect.filterHelper: Type to filter, click to add or remove.

errors.title: Error:
errors.generic: An error occurred. Please try again.
errors.unauthorized: You need to be logged in to manage resources.

Footer.note: Made with care for speech-language pathology teams. Mobile-first, adaptive, and built for collaboration.

taxonomy.pageLead: Configure the dropdown lists used in the test forms.

helpers.label: Provide a clear label to help admins identify the entry.
helpers.color: Optional. Use a hex code or pick a predefined color to keep lists consistent.
helpers.description: Keep it concise so it fits in tooltips and list previews.
helpers.themeBadge: Improves search and filters for clinical use.

themes.cardHelper: Clinical entries for filtering by topic.
themes.label: Theme name

tags.cardHelper: Keywords to refine search (e.g., Quick assessment, Adult).
tags.label: Label

filters.noResultsHelper: No result for {query}. Adjust the search or reset filters.

states.emptyLead: Add your first entry to build the selection lists.

metadata.title: Manage categories and tags | Othoutils
metadata.description: Add, delete, or rename test domains and tags.

page.title: Categories & tags
page.lead: Centralize the list of domains and tags used in the test sheet. Items created here are immediately available in the "Add / Edit a test" form.

domains.title: Create a domain
domains.helper: Domains feed the "Domains" list in the Add / Edit a test form.

tags.title: Create a tag
tags.helper: Tags enrich search and filters in test sheets.

errors.generic: An error occurred. Please try again.
errors.timeout: The request timed out, please try again.
errors.fetch: Unable to retrieve domains and tags.

toasts.domainCreated: The domain has been saved and will be available in the test form.
toasts.tagCreated: The tag has been saved and will be available in the test form.

metadata.title: Add a tool | Othoutils
metadata.description: Create a tool sheet to enrich the catalog.

intro.title: Fill in the key details so a new sheet appears in the catalog.
intro.required: The Name, Category, Type, Tags, and Source fields are required. Sheets created here are flagged as community contributions and will appear in the main list.
intro.preview: Need to review the layout? Check the <catalogLink>catalog</catalogLink> after publishing.

helpers.tags: Separate tags with commas. They will be used to filter the catalog.

tags.required: Add at least one tag, separated by commas

source.url: Source must be a valid URL

feedback.success: The sheet has been created. It will appear in the catalog under the “Community” label.

meta.title: Manage taxonomy | Othoutils
meta.description: Maintain domains, tags, themes, and resource types used throughout the catalog.

taxonomyManagement.pageLead: Organize domains, tags, themes, and resource types to keep the catalog consistent across locales.

sidebar.title: Choose a taxonomy
sidebar.lead: Select a category to review its entries.

hints.domains: Used to structure the catalog and searchable via synonyms

descriptions.themes: Themes include a label, optional description, and synonyms to improve search.
descriptions.domains: Domains help structure the catalog hierarchy, group tools, and can store synonyms to speed up discovery.
descriptions.tags: Tags add lightweight labels. Add localized synonyms and an optional color to highlight them.
descriptions.resourceTypes: Resource types keep resource sheets consistent and are reused in the admin form.

messages.loadError: Unable to load the taxonomy list.
messages.deleteConfirm: Delete this entry? This action cannot be undone.

hints.domainHelper: Attach the theme to one or more domains

metadata.title: Othoutils | Federated search
metadata.description: Search assessments, self-reports, and external resources from one place.

SearchHub.headingText: Filter assessments, self-reports, and external resources instantly with faceted filters inspired by DocSearch and Linear.
SearchHub.helper: Use the filters on the left to focus on a type or domain. Results update immediately without reloading the page.

filters.title: Filters
filters.lead: Combine types and domains to narrow results.

selfReports.title: Self-reports
selfReports.subtitle: Questionnaires filled directly by patients or caregivers.

resources.title: Resources
resources.subtitle: External links, guides, and digital helpers.

layout.headline: Clinical tools, securely at your fingertips
layout.subheadline: Authenticate to manage your catalogue, publish tests, and collaborate with your team without friction.

security.title: Trusted security
security.description: Encrypted sessions with granular Supabase policies safeguard clinical data.

speed.title: Faster check-in
speed.description: Polished flows to help you sign in and get back to your patients quickly.

catalog.title: Ready-to-use tools
catalog.description: Centralize your assessments, domains, and tags in one streamlined hub.

support.title: Specialist support
support.description: Guidance from the Orthoutil team when you need to adjust access or recover an account.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
forgotPassword.subtitle: We will email you a secure reset link so you can regain access in a few steps.
forgotPassword.successMessage: If this account exists, a reset email has been sent.

login.title: Sign in
login.subtitle: Access your Orthoutil workspace with secure credentials and streamlined navigation.

footer.disclaimer: By continuing, you agree to our Terms of Use and acknowledge the Privacy Policy.

feedback.magicLinkSent: Check your email for a secure sign-in link.

signup.title: Create your account
signup.subtitle: Set up your credentials to start curating assessments, domains, and tags.

feedback.emailConfirmation: Check your inbox to confirm your email and continue.

password.length: Password must be at least 8 characters
